bug.author: harmindergit
bug.description:
Description of issue: The image link for quickdraw_model.png is broken in document <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/tutorials/sequences/recurrent_quickdraw.md>recurrent_quickdraw.md</denchmark-link>
The current source url for the image points to non existent image location. Url: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/tutorials/sequences/recurrent_quickdraw.md>recurrent_quickdraw.md</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Unable to locate the broken link in the markdown file referenced in the issue. Can you please try to elaborate? Thanks!

the link to the image (Line 16) <denchmark-link:../../images/quickdraw_model.png></denchmark-link> is not correct. it is below this paragraph "In this tutorial we'll show how to build an RNN-based recognizer for this problem. The model will use a combination of convolutional layers, LSTM layers, and a softmax output layer to classify the drawings:"
